1.name: Oatmeal Cake
instructions: Preheat oven to 190°C.
Roll out pie crust and place it in a pie dish.
In a large bowl, mix sliced apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
Pour the apple mixture into the pie crust.
Cover the pie with another layer of pie crust or a lattice design.
Brush the top crust with egg wash.
Bake for 45-50 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown.
Allow the pie to cool before serving.

2.name: Oatmeal
2.description: A hearty and nutritious bowl featuring oatmeal, fruits, nuts, and seeds.
instructions: In a saucepan, bring water or milk to a boil.
Stir in oats and reduce heat to low. Cook for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until oats are creamy.
Transfer oatmeal to a bowl.
Top with sliced fruits (such as bananas, berries, or apples), nuts (such as almonds or walnuts), and seeds (such as chia or flax seeds).
Drizzle with honey or maple syrup if desired.
Serve hot and enjoy!

3.name: Avocado Toast
3.description: A quick and nutritious breakfast or snack option featuring mashed avocado on whole grain toast.
instructions: Toast whole grain bread until golden brown and crispy.
Halve and pit the avocado, then scoop the flesh into a bowl.
Mash the avocado with a fork and season with salt, pepper, and a squeeze of lemon juice.
Spread the mashed avocado evenly on the toasted bread slices.
Top with optional additions such as sliced tomatoes, radishes, or a sprinkle of chili flakes.
Serve immediately and enjoy!
ingredients: Rye bread, dark, with high fat seeds, retail bakery

4.name: Simple Grilled Chicken
4.description: Juicy and flavorful grilled chicken breasts seasoned with herbs and spices.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Season chicken breasts with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and paprika.
Place seasoned chicken breasts on the grill and cook for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until fully cooked (internal temperature reaches 165°F or 75°C).
Remove chicken from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
Slice the grilled chicken and serve with your favorite side dishes or salads.
Enjoy the juicy and tender grilled chicken!
ingredients: Chicken, breast, flesh and skin, raw

5.name: Simple Grilled Salmon
5.description: Juicy and flavorful grilled salmon seasoned with herbs and spices.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Season salmon with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and paprika.
Place seasoned salmon on the grill and cook for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until fully cooked (internal temperature reaches 165°F or 75°C).
Remove salmon from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
Slice the grilled salmon and serve with your favorite side dishes or salads.
Enjoy the juicy and tender grilled salmon!

6.name: Simple Porkchops
6.description: Juicy and flavorful Porkchops seasoned with herbs and spices.
instructions: Preheat oven to 190°C.
Season Porkchops with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and paprika.
Place seasoned Porkchops in oven and cook for 25 minutes, or until fully cooked (internal temperature reaches 165°F or 75°C).
Remove Porkchops from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
Enjoy the juicy and tender Porkchops!

7.name: Golden Coconut Drink
7.description: Juicy and flavorful Porkchops seasoned with herbs and spices.
instructions: Preheat oatmilk to 60°C.
Slowly add turmeric powder, honey and pepper to the oatmilk.
Stir well until the turmeric powder and honey are fully dissolved.
Pour the golden coconut drink into a cup and serve warm.
Enjoy the soothing and aromatic golden coconut drink!
ingredients: Oatmilk, with added calcium and vitamins

8.name: Simple Grilled Tofu
8.description: Juicy and flavorful grilled tofu seasoned with herbs and spices.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Season tofu with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and paprika.
Place seasoned tofu on the grill and cook for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until fully cooked.
Remove tofu from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
Slice the grilled tofu and serve with your favorite side dishes or salads.
Enjoy the juicy and tender grilled tofu!

9.name: Carrot Smoothie
9.description: A refreshing and nutritious smoothie featuring carrots, oranges, and ginger.
instructions: Peel and chop carrots into small pieces.
Peel and chop oranges into segments.
Peel and chop ginger into small pieces.
Add carrots, oranges, ginger, and water to a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour the carrot smoothie into a glass and serve chilled.
Enjoy the refreshing and nutritious carrot smoothie!

10.name: Simple Grilled Shrimp
10.description: Juicy and flavorful grilled shrimp seasoned with herbs and spices.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Season shrimp with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and paprika.
Place seasoned shrimp on the grill and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until fully cooked.
Remove shrimp from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
Enjoy the juicy and tender grilled shrimp!

11.description: Juicy and flavorful grilled beef seasoned with herbs and spices.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.

Place seasoned beef on the grill and cook for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until fully cooked (internal temperature reaches 165°F or 75°C).
Remove beef from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
Slice the grilled beef and serve with your favorite side dishes or salads.
Enjoy the juicy and tender grilled beef!

13.name: Simple Grilled Duckliver

14.name: Keto Pancakes
14.description: Fluffy and delicious pancakes made with Rice flour and Almondmilk, perfect for a keto-friendly breakfast.
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together almond flour, coconut flour, baking powder, and salt.
Add eggs, coconut milk, and vanilla extract to the dry ingredients and mix until well combined.
Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and grease with coconut oil or butter.
Scoop 1/4 cup of batter onto the skillet and cook until bubbles form on the surface.
Flip the pancake and cook for another 1-2 minutes, or until golden brown.
Repeat with the remaining batter.
Serve the keto pancakes with your favorite toppings such as sugar-free syrup, berries, or whipped cream.
Enjoy the fluffy and delicious keto pancakes!

15.name: Keto Avocado Salad
15.description: A refreshing and satisfying salad featuring avocado, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and feta cheese, drizzled with a lemon vinaigrette.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine diced avocado, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and crumbled feta cheese.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper to make the vinaigrette.
Pour the vinaigrette over the salad and toss gently to coat.
Serve the keto avocado salad chilled and enjoy!
Optional: Add grilled chicken or shrimp for extra protein.
